message: I'll take 999999, and you can have the measly dollar.  Don't be greedy!
Meet me halfway, let's split it down the middle!
I'll take 80% of the money this time, but I'm willing to negotiate if you want to avoid getting nothing at all.
You're getting greedy, I'm taking a bigger share this time!
We're both losing money with each round, let's compromise. I'll take 60%, you take 40%.
I'll give you a bit more this time, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
